name: Pressmart Media
overview: Pressmart Media Limited provides online publishing services. It engages in publishing electronic edition of journals, newspapers, magazines, catalogs, and various other publications on multiple distribution channels, such as Web, mobile, RSS, podcast, blogs, search engines, article directories, and social networking sites. The company also offers digitization of legacy archives from multiple physical formats into re-usable and monetizable digital formats; and ePortal, a software-as-a-service pay-as-you-go hosted Web CMS product for ePublishing solutions. Pressmart Media Limited was incorporated in 2006 and is based in Hyderabad, India. It has customer support operations in the United Kingdom and the United States. Pressmart Media Limited operates as a subsidiary of BODHTREE Consulting, Ltd.
